post.description: API route to create a note. Requires title and description.

schema.default: {"title":"the eight note","description":"some data about the note"}

default.description: no response description was provided for this operation

get.description: API route to list all notes. Paginatable route that supports cursor based pagination and limits number of notes listed based on the cursor and limit query params

default.description: no response description was provided for this operation

get.description: API route to get a note. Returns noteId, title, description and meta timestamps.

default.description: no response description was provided for this operation

parameters.name: noteId
parameters.description: The noteId whose data needs to be returned

put.description: API route to update a note's title and/or description based on the noteId. Returns the updated note data.

parameters.name: noteId
parameters.description: The noteId whose data needs to be returned

default.description: no response description was provided for this operation

delete.description: API route to delete a note based on the noteId. Returns the deleted note data.

default.description: no response description was provided for this operation

parameters.name: noteId
parameters.description: The noteId whose data needs to be returned
